# NSMapTableCopyIn

**Global Variable**

Equivalent to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/Options/copyIn].

## Declaration

```swift
let NSMapTableCopyIn: NSPointerFunctions.Options
```

## Copy Option

- **copyIn**: Use the memory acquire function to allocate and copy items on input (see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSPointerFunctions/acquireFunction]).
